title: Dwarven Grace Charity
mainText: For each player in turn order: Reveal cards from the top of the exploration pile until you reveal a resource card then add the revealed card to your hand. After all players have done this, shuffle the exploration pile.
flavourText: I don't like this charity. Where did they get all their stuff from anyway? - Alisa, the Underpaid Dwarven Labourer.
